price: (27) So Allāh conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.
arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: famanna al-lahu ʿalaynā wawaqānā ʿadhāba al-samūmi
